content: today topic is my latest crochet pattern 2023 adult ladies and gents spiral hat start with rib band and continue from bottom to top very easy pattern we explain in details for all sizes i have the super easy spiral hat pattern for ladies and gents new coming season fall and winter you can be easily to change sizes as you want to make we explain below in the pattern for all sizes and also share in my video tutorial use light dk weight #3 yarn with 3 5mm e hook size we mention about details in inches about the pattern from start with rib band and continue from bottom to top you can make it easy for all sizes as you want
